name: Final Orbit / Bumper Bash
overview: Originally released as The Earth Dies Screaming on Atari 8-bit by Sirius Software, Inc.. It's an action game, set in a sci-fi / futuristic, shooter, space flight and space combat themes, and was also released on VIC-20. Two games in one: a space shoot-em-up and a pinball simulation. It has two 4k games inside one 8k chip Press C= key to switch between games. The space game controls with a joystick. The F and L keys control the pinball flippers. Press F to load a ball into the ramp, L to adjust, both F and L together to start.
